courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement and THEA 208; or consent of instructor.
description: Introduction to the principal modes of dramatic expression from around 1870 to the present day. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement and THEA 208; or consent of instructor.
label: Literature of Modern Theatre
sectionDegreeAttributes: Advanced Composition, and Literature and the Arts course.
